features: 🍃【Higher-Efficiency 3 Stage Filtration System】 Air purifiers for bedroom in home features a Pre-Filter, H13 True HEPA Filter, Activated Carbon work together to re-m0ve 99.97% of airborne particles 0.3 microns in size, such as dust, smoke, pollen, pet fur, odor etc. Relief sneezing itchy etc and it's good choice for pets owner.

🍃【Add Fragrance Design Sponge】HEPA air purifiers for home also has an aromatherapy add-on where essential oils (not inculded) can be applied to the sponge material (inculded 5 pieces replacement sponge) below the purifier air outlet . You can add any scent you want to get the freshest smell for your room.

🍃【Circular Design for 360° Coverage】Slevoo air purifier with its cylindrical base, the unique top air outlet leaning on front for more direct air flow to users and increase 45% Circulation Spend than others. The cylindrical design is both pleasing to the eye and efficient.

🍃【2023 New Updated - Energy Efficient】It is enough for this small air purifiers for pets to clean any spaces up to 215 square feet and only uses from 7 to 18 watts for power consumption. Noise Level: 24-50dB. You can use the air purifier 24/7 without worrying of the electricity bill.

🍃【User-Friendly】①Pressing the child lock button for 3–5 seconds you'll freeze the touch panel. This is definitely a useful function if you have curious children or pets at home. ②The Check Filter Indicator will let you know when it’s time for a fresh filter and the filter’s actual performance will depend on how often you run your air cleaner and how air quality level is.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Unique Elegant Design And Usability Not all things good have to be expensive. Slevoo BS-03 H13 True HEPA air purifier is exactly at the end of the affordable spectrum without having to sacrifice on the filtration. The distinctive black exterior with a top turbine outlet is very pleasing. At a compact cylinder shape of 9.6 inches in diameter and 17 inches in height, it is highly suited for places with bad air. Complementing that is the lightweight 3.2 pounds that makes room to room purifying and for traveling an effortless task. Moving to usability, Slevoo BS-03 front controls are clearly laid out and easily visible for a quick setup. You can adjust the fan speeds, reset the filter change indicator, lock the controls from children and pets, and light dimmer button that turns off indicator light for night use. Adding all that is a fragrance sponge slot underneath the turbine that you can insert your favorite essential oil (not inculded) like Citrus, Honeydew Melon, Musk, Vanilla, Orris or Vetiver to freshen the air. With its cylindrical base, the Slevoo air purifier can pull in air from all directions in your room. This provides better overall coverage. The air outlet is from the top surface of the air purifier. The outlet is slightly slanted downwards so that the air does not escape directly upwards. Clean air flows into your room smoothly as a result. VERY IMPORTANT: While the air purifier will arrive fully assembled, the filter will be encased in protective plastic. Unless this plastic cover is removed, the air purifier will not work even if it is turned on.You should replace the filter every 3-6 months, depending on use. In the product's graphic introduction from the brand, there is a guide on how to buy a genuine replacement filter of BS-03 Air Purifer, which is only under 20 dollar for two filter and expect a recurring only under 50 dollars in cost a year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little purifier
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Product is easy to set up and use, pretty strait forward with directions. Works great, is quiet and am happy to have clean air. 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice product
reviews.reviewText: These work perfectly for our rooms. Easy to use. Filters are also easy to change out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good for a small/medium size room/office. Noisy on highest level but doesn’t bother me. Easy to use. No longer see dust particles or dog hair in the air. Does a great job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet compact purifier
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed with this tiny purifier. Sleep mode is quiet and it does purify air in my bedroom.Like that I can also use Essential oils to diffuse. Easy to put together. Don't turn on until you take out the plastic on the filter that is located inside the filter. Replacement filters are affordable and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fan rattled but seller sent replacement
reviews.reviewText: Edit: Raising my review to 5 stars from 3. Seller contacted me and offered to send me a replacement without requiring me to go through the hassle of packaging and sending the old unit back. The replacement unit works as expected so I'm perfectly content with my purchase.Overall this unit could be much better if there was more QC on the fan. The one I received has a fan that makes a rattling sound when it runs at higher speeds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for use in my bonus room/office where my cat stays. I wanted something to help lessen the smell of clean cat litter and it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Short life span but worked well for 5 months.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this at the end of March. Couldn’t smell the essential oils that I put into the spot but that’s ok. I wasn’t so concerned. I felt like it collected dust from the air and helped keep the room smelling neutral. I noticed it had stopped working at the end of August I didn’t have time to look at it then and I thought it was probably come unplugged or user error. (Me). When I had time to look at it closer and try other outlets, checked the filter which it had a new one and I realized, it’s done. I definitely expected more than 5 months of out it. I could have a bad one and it wasn’t that expensive. Just disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size and quiet
reviews.reviewText: Really happy with this air purifier small/medium size perfect size for a small room and very effective taking my dogs hair out from my toddler room, price was a bargain and fast delivery highly recommended you can even added some essentials oil on top

It's great quality air purifier makes no loud noise very quiet and does the job great and gets rid of smoke smell instantly no smell or smoke or dust has a great hepa filter inside that does the job great
Purifies air and makes a big difference when I smoke in my room (🍃)

J'ai obtenu cet appareil à moitié prix dans les autres offres et j'ai vérifié avant de commander si les filtres étaient facile à trouver et s'ils étaient vendus à un prix raisonnable. Donc, oui, je suis satisfait de cet article qui remplace mon ancien modèle dont il aspirait sur une seule face seulement. L'article récemment acheté aspire l'air de tous les côtés et je sens déjà une énorme différence.
